choose.when:
select /*+ INDEX(bc_member bc_member_pk) */ * from bc_member where member_del = 0
and member_id like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and member_nickname like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and member_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
order by member_idx desc limit ${startIdx}, 10
choose.otherwise: select /*+ INDEX(bc_member bc_member_pk) */ * from bc_member where member_del = 0 order by member_idx desc limit ${startIdx}, 10

choose.when:
select count(*) from bc_member where member_del = 0
and member_id like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and member_nickname like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and member_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from bc_member where member_del = 0
